name: Balance Life
description: This is a game that I made to reflect on the different demands and wishes in everyday existence. Since it is fall and I made it very quickly for a game jam, the in-game graphics were inspired by the season. Some parts had to be finished faster and a bit more superficial than I would have liked, but there was simply not enough time left. It was a great experience though and I hope you'll find it enjoyable to play.
